subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
lead_paragraph: Freshly anointed as the No. 1 choice in Saturday’s draft, and the newest member of the Miami Dolphins, Jake Long is out from under the microscope, for now.
snippet: Freshly anointed as the No. 1 choice in Saturday’s draft, and the newest member of the Miami Dolphins, Jake Long is out from under the microscope, for now.
